pages.text: A misting who burns $(thing)copper$()is known as a "$(thing)Smoker$()". $(br)A smoker burning copper generates a 'coppercloud,' which hides Allomancy from being detected by Bronze. Although I've never witnessed it, I've heard that a seeker of considerable strength could pierce a coppercloud. More research is required.$(br)Copper is the internal pulling metal and one of four mental metals (alongside Zinc, Brass, and Bronze)
